|- id="Guyun Stone Forest"
|[[Guyun Stone Forest]]
|An archipelago of seven large islands and smaller offshoots.<br />According to legend, this is where [[Rex Lapis]] defeated a god and sea monster known as [[Osial]], and the jagged cliffs protruding from the islands at Guyun are in fact the remnants of the stone lances he used in that battle.
|[[File:Viewpoint A Drop in the Ocean.png|180px]]
|- id="Liyue Harbor"
|[[Liyue Harbor]]
|The main city of the [[Liyue]] nation.<br />During the [[Archon War]], after [[Guizhong]] died, [[Rex Lapis]] brought his people south of [[Mt. Tianheng]], to found what is now known as Liyue Harbor.
|[[File:Viewpoint Where Merchants Flock And All Ships Dock.png|180px]]
|- id="Mt. Tianheng"
|[[Mt. Tianheng]]
|A mountain west of Liyue Harbor, raised by [[Morax]] when he first descended upon Liyue, and there people congregated to mine ore from the mountains.
|[[File:Mt. Tianheng.jpeg|180px]]
|}

==Points of Interest==
{| class="article-table" style="width: 100%;"
! style="width: 25%;" |Name
! style="width: 50%;" |Description
! style="width: 25%;" |Image
|- id="Alcor"
|[[Alcor]]
|The flagship of [[The Crux]]. While it is normally helmed by Captain [[Beidou]], she has returned to [[Liyue Harbor]] for business and left the ship to her men.
|[[File:Alcor.png|180px]]
|- id="Feiyun Slope"
|[[Feiyun Slope]]
|Feiyun Slope is the northeastern area in Liyue Harbor. It is the first area entered upon entering Liyue Harbor via the main road from Mondstadt. A sloped staircase separates the upper and lower levels of the area. From the northern Teleport Waypoint in Liyue Harbor, turn left at the T-section to enter the upper Feiyun Slope area.
|[[File:Feiyun Slope.png|180px]]
|- id="Chihu Rock"
|[[Chihu Rock]]
|Chihu Rock is the southern end of Liyue Harbor, between Feiyun Slope and the South Wharf. It is primarily a commercial area where many stores and vendors can be found.
|[[File:Chihu Rock.png|180px]]
|- id="Yujing Terrace"
|[[Yujing Terrace]]
|Yujing Terrace is the area on the northwestern side of Liyue Harbor, to the left of the northern Teleport Waypoint on the World Map. After teleporting to that waypoint, head straight and turn right.
|[[File:Yujing Terrace.png|180px]]
|- id="Emerald Maple Inn"
|[[Emerald Maple Inn]]
|The Emerald Maple Inn is an inn located west of the Statue of The Seven at the Sea of Clouds, Liyue, and overlooks Luhua Pool. Due to its relatively remote location, its proprietor, Mr. Zhu, struggles to get patrons.
|[[File:NPC Location Mr. Zhu Context.png|180px]]
|- id="Golden House"
|[[Golden House]]
|The Golden House is where all of Teyvat's Mora is minted. When Rex Lapis died, his corpse, the Exuvia, was moved here by the Liyue Qixing.
|[[File:The Golden House.png|180px]]
|}
